title: Milinda Madugalle
text:
Milinda Madugalle is a <a href="Cinema%20of%20Sri%20Lanka">Sri Lankan film actor</a> and a singer.
Early life and education.
Milinda was educated at <a href="Nalanda%20College%2C%20Colombo">Nalanda College, Colombo</a>.
Career.
In Milinda's most recent film <a href="Nalaka%20Vithanage">Nalaka Vithanage</a>'s Roopantharana he acts with <a href="Ravindra%20Randeniya">Ravindra Randeniya</a>, <a href="Ranjan%20Ramanayake">Ranjan Ramanayake</a>, <a href="Tissa%20Wijesurendra">Tissa Wijesurendra</a> and Amila Karunanayake.
